data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Chi-Feng, Ẽk, Jan Bezd (2013): Revision of Gallerucida singularis species group (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae). Zootaxa 3647 (2): 358-370, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3647.2.7
